      • setCurrencyFile

        private java.lang.String setCurrencyFile(int currencySelection)

        Returns:
        String representing currency filename

      • setInventoryFile

        This method accepts an integer representing the inventory selection (drinks, snacks, other) and sets filename equal to the file containing the inventory information.

        Returns:
        String representing inventory filename

      • displayInventory

        private void displayInventory(Item[] itemArray)
        This method accepts an Item[] representing the inventory and prints out information for each item in the array.
        Parameters:
        itemArray - Item[] containing all inventory Items

      • displayVendingCurrency

        private void displayVendingCurrency(Item[] itemArray,
                                    int currencySelection)
        This method accepts an Item[] representing the currency to be used and the amount held by the vending machine. Also accepts an int value representing the currency type selection. Prints information for each currency Item in the array.
        Parameters:
        itemArray - Item[] containing all currency Items
        currencySelection - int indicating currency selection

      • displayMoneyCounter

        private void displayMoneyCounter(Item[] itemArray,
                                 int currencySelection)
        This method accepts an Item[] representing the money inserted into the vending machine during a particular purchase process. Also accepts an int value representing the currency type selection. Prints information for each currency Item in the array.
        Parameters:
        itemArray - Item[] containing all currency Items
        currencySelection - int indicating currency selection

      • displayAllInfo

        private void displayAllInfo(Item[] currency,
                            Item[] inventory,
                            Item[] moneyCounter,
                            int currencySelection)
        This method displays all information to include inventory, vending machine currency held, and the per use money counter.
        Parameters:
        currency - Item[] containing all currency Items
        inventory - Item[] containing all inventory Items
        moneyCounter - Item[] containing all money counter Items
        currencySelection - int indicating currency selection

      • createMoneyCounter

        private Item[] createMoneyCounter(Item[] currency)
        This method creates an Item[] representing the per use money counter. All denominations are set to zero. Returns the Item[].
        Parameters:
        currency - Item[] containing all currency Items
        Returns:
        Item[] representing the per use money counter

      • runVM

        private void runVM(int mainSelection,
                   Item[] currency,
                   Item[] inventory,
                   Item[] moneyCounter,
                   int currencySelection)
        This method is the primary method used to run the vending machine simulator.
        Parameters:
        mainSelection - int representing main menu user selection
        currency - Item[] containing all currency Items
        inventory - Item[] containing all inventory Items
        moneyCounter - Item[] containing all money counter Items
        currencySelection - int indicating currency selection

      • insertMoney

        private void insertMoney(int moneySelection,
                         Item[] currency,
                         Item[] moneyCounter)
        This method represents inserting money into the vending machine.
        Parameters:
        moneySelection - int indicating currency selection
        currency - Item[] containing all currency Items
        moneyCounter - Item[] containing all money counter Items

      • removeAllMoney

        private void removeAllMoney(Item[] currency,
                            Item[] moneyCounter)
        This method represents canceling a transaction and returning all money to the user from the vending machine.
        Parameters:
        currency - Item[] containing all currency Items
        moneyCounter - Item[] containing all money counter Items

      • totalMoney

        private int totalMoney(Item[] moneyCounter)
        This method is used to calculate the total value of money inserted by the user.
        Parameters:
        moneyCounter - Item[] containing all money counter Items
        Returns:
        int value representing total value of money inserted

      • purchaseItem

        private void purchaseItem(int totalMoney,
                          int itemSelection,
                          Item[] inventory,
                          Item[] currency,
                          Item[] moneyCounter)
        This method represents purchasing an item. Checks if sufficient money has been inserted to purchase the selected item. Checks if sufficient change is available to return to the user. Returns change to user after purchase.
        Parameters:
        totalMoney - int representing total value of money inserted
        itemSelection - int indicating currency selection
        inventory - Item[] containing all inventory Items
        currency - Item[] containing all currency Items
        moneyCounter - Item[] containing all money counter Items

      • calculateChange

        private int[] calculateChange(int totalMoney,
                              int itemSelection,
                              Item[] inventory,
                              Item[] currency,
                              Item[] moneyCounter)
        This method calculates the change to give to the user after a purchase. Ensures that adequate quantity of money exists in the vending machine to succesfuly provide change. Calculates change by denomination, not total value. Highest denominations are prioritized (change returned with as few bills/coins as possible).
        Parameters:
        totalMoney - int representing total value of money inserted
        itemSelection - int indicating currency selection
        inventory - Item[] containing all inventory Items
        currency - Item[] containing all currency Items
        moneyCounter - Item[] containing all money counter Items
        Returns:
        int[] representing amount of each denomination to return

      • returnChange

        private void returnChange(int[] change,
                          Item[] moneyCounter,
                          Item[] currency)
        This method returns the change to the user, removing it from the vending machine in the process and reseting the money counter Items to zero quantity.
        Parameters:
        change - int[] representing amount of each denomination to return
        moneyCounter - Item[] containing all money counter Items
        currency - Item[] containing all currency Items
